pages.text: $(l)Stats$()$(li)Shear drops: Snuffle Fluff, Frosty Fluff, Fine Wool (50% chance), Frozen Hair (20% chance) $(li)Drops: Frozen Tear$(br2)$(l)Notes$()$(br)Fine Wool only drops at 5+ hearts of affection.
